::Magmatron::

    "So you finally decide to return my calls?" Magmatron said into the comm. 
"Well, if you really are serious about joining the Destrons then enter. And 
learn." Magmatron said with a dark undertone. He noticed another of the small 
insects. He squashed it. "Bugs, nasty fellows."
    He had decided on his course of action, and there was only one logical 
step remaining. He started the recording.
    "Bobertron, if you have received this message then I am offline. I wish 
for you to return to the Destron base and take command. All the access codes 
are in one computer, mine. They will be opened to your signature only in the 
event of my death. If you do get this message, try and get Pantron on our 
side, he will be of great help. All my plans are also in the main computer, 
no matter how different from what you thought I was planning follow them 
anyway possible, I do hope you understand. Good-bye."
    He was very proud of his work, everything was going according to his 
plan. He quickly made his way to near the entrance of the base hoping to 
catch the Destrocons before they made it too far into his base.
